Container.Name: CloudflaredTunnel
Container.Overview:
This is an Easy and SAFE Container to use Cloudflare Zero Trust Tunnel.
It uses only the offical Docker Container from Cloudflared itself. No 3rd party scripts involed.
Config guide: -Enable Advaned View in the top right Corner -look for "Post Arguments" and past in your token after "--token *YourTokenHere*" so it looks something like this at the end -> tunnel --no-autoupdate run --token 1234567890
